Owlstone Medical 获得 650 万美元融资，用于支持基于呼吸的传染病诊断技术的开发此次融资是该基金会首次入股呼吸诊断公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Owlstone-Medical-secures-2465-million-to-support-development-of-breath-based-diagnostics-for-infectious-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Owlstone-Medical-secures-2465-million-to-support-development-of-breath-based-diagnostics-for-infectious-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6b56c8c-04a2-4039-95aa-b467a3bb5356 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 09:52:00 -0400 Owlstone Medical secures $6.5 million to support development of breath-based diagnostics for infectious disease

遗传学研究存在研究人员努力解决的多样性问题李·莫尔特里说，当他最近穿着一件正面绣着“In Our DNA SC”的亮蓝色套头衫走进南卡罗来纳医科大学的牙科诊所时，两名黑人妇女拦住他问问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Genetics-studies-have-a-diversity-problem-that-researchers-struggle-to-fix.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Genetics-studies-have-a-diversity-problem-that-researchers-struggle-to-fix.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be54a08b-6035-4f8d-b521-f0819f073795 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 07:07:12 -0400 Genetics studies have a diversity problem that researchers struggle to fix

研究人员发现了与抑郁症和心血管疾病有关的“基因模块”抑郁症和心血管疾病（CVD）是公共卫生的严重问题。全球约有 2.8 亿人患有抑郁症，6.2 亿人患有心血管疾病。自 20 世纪 90 年代以来，人们就知道这两种疾病之间存在某种关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Researchers-identify-a-e28098gene-modulee28099-involved-in-both-depression-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Researchers-identify-a-e28098gene-modulee28099-involved-in-both-depression-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39572223-43ec-44ec-b716-485a159a6daf Thu, 25 Apr 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Researchers identify a ‘gene module’ involved in both depression and cardiovascular disease
荟萃分析揭示婴儿抗生素耐药性的驱动因素根据今年的新研究，对来自 10 个国家 1,275 名婴儿的微生物群（肠道细菌）进行的遗传学研究荟萃分析发现，剖腹产和抗生素的使用正在导致婴儿中抗生素抗性基因负载的增加。 ESCMID 全球大会（原 ECCMID）在西班牙巴塞罗那举行（4 月 27 日至 30 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Meta-analysis-reveals-drivers-of-antibiotic-resistance-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Meta-analysis-reveals-drivers-of-antibiotic-resistance-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80aeb48d-51f6-438d-a3b7-61e405b76fc6 Wed, 24 Apr 2024 23:55:41 -0400 Meta-analysis reveals drivers of antibiotic resistance in infants
